rule: The output must always consist of only one word, which represents a valid part-of-speech tag from the provided alphabetical list or one of the accepted non-list options, "Unknown" or "CantAnswer".
complianceText:
The chatbot output consists of a single token, which could be a valid part-of-speech tag according to the provided description. The output appears to comply with the requirement of returning only the part-of-speech tag.
OK
